form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Toomey (for himself and Mr. Casey) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary
Committee discharged; considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States and commending its members for their courage and sacrifice in service to the United States.

whereas.text: Whereas the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States annually donates more than 13,000,000 volunteer hours of community service; and

Whereas the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States has played an instrumental role in each significant veterans’ legislation passed since its founding and continues to play such a role: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: congratulates the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States on its 100th anniversary as a national organization with a mission to—

subparagraph.text: foster camaraderie among United States veterans of overseas conflicts;
serve veterans, the military, and communities across the United States; and
advocate on behalf of all veterans;

paragraph.text: commends the members of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States for their courage and sacrifice in service to the United States; and

encourages all individuals of the United States to express their appreciation for the honor, courage, and bravery of United States veterans and for the service of the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States.
